{{joke feature}}
{{Stub|section=1}}
This page documents the layouts of the [[Creative inventory]] within [[April Fools]] updates.

== April Fools updates ==
Several [[April Fools' Day jokes|joke updates]] introduced new items, resulting in new tabs or new items in existing tabs.
